mapper.sql: order_id, member_idx, price, payment_method, order_addr, order_notes, order_date, update_date, order_status
mapper.select: SELECT od.*, o.member_idx, p.pname, o.order_date, od.quantity * p.pprice as pAmountPrice, o.payment_method, o.order_addr, o.order_notes, o.order_status, o.update_date , p.thumb_name AS imgName, p.thumb_path AS imgPath FROM orderDetail od JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.member_idx = #{memberIdx};
